name: raspberrypi-rotary-encoder
description: Reliable monitoring of rotary encoders from a raspberry pi

scripts.preinstall: sudo apt-get install python-dev python-pip && sudo apt-get install wiringpi && sudo pip install wiringpi && cd && git clone https://github.com/guyc/py-gaugette.git && cd py-gaugette && sudo python setup.py install && cd && git clone https://github.com/doceme/py-spidev.git && cd py-spidev && sudo python setup.py install

author: kevincastejon
